CustomField.description: This field is used for old role mapping which are used in call conversation report for Pam Malena
CustomField.formula:
CASE( UserRole.Name,
"ASG (Aquatics)", "Back Office Agent Role",
"CCO", "Back Office Agent Role",
"CERT", "Back Office Agent Role",
"CST", "Back Office Agent Role",
"ISG", "Back Office Agent Role",
"RDC", "Back Office Agent Role",
"Trainer", "Back Office Agent Role",
"PRT Group", "Back Office Agent Role",
"Front Office At Home Agent Role", "At Home Agent Role",
"TSC Management", "Training Support Center",
"Training Support QA", "Training Support Center",
"Font Office Uniontown - ATG", "Front Office Uniontown Agent Role",
"Front Office - Chat Agent", "Chat Agent Role",
UserRole.Name)
CustomField.label: Legacy Role
